snippet: Hispanics graduate from high schools much less frequently than other Texans, and as their population gets larger, there may be a price to pay.
lead_paragraph: Hispanics graduate from high schools much less frequently than other Texans, and as their population gets larger, there may be a price to pay.

headline.seo: As Hispanic Population Grows, the Education Gap May Grow, Too
headline.main: No Child Left Behind. Just a Demographic.
headline.print_headline: No Child Left Behind. Just a Demographic.
